014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.internal;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Method;
017import java.util.Arrays;
018import java.util.Map;
019import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
020import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
021import java.util.function.Supplier;
022import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
023
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.extension.ExtensionMethod;
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.extension.HandleSupplier;
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.Invocations;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.MemoizingSupplier;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Sneaky;
030import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.GenerateSqlObject;
031import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.Handler;
032import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.SqlObject;
033import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.UnableToCreateSqlObjectException;
034
035public final class SqlObjectInitData {
036    private static final Object[] NO_ARGS = new Object[0];
037    public static final ThreadLocal<SqlObjectInitData> INIT_DATA = new ThreadLocal<>();
038
039    private final boolean concrete;
040    private final Class<?> extensionType;
041    private final UnaryOperator<ConfigRegistry> instanceConfigurer;
042    private final Map<Method, UnaryOperator<ConfigRegistry>> methodConfigurers;
043    private final Map<Method, Handler> methodHandlers;
044
045    public SqlObjectInitData(
046            Class<?> extensionType,
047            UnaryOperator<ConfigRegistry> instanceConfigurer,
048            Map<Method, UnaryOperator<ConfigRegistry>> methodConfigurers,
049            Map<Method, Handler> methodHandlers) {
050        concrete = isConcrete(extensionType);
051        this.extensionType = extensionType;
052        this.instanceConfigurer = instanceConfigurer;
053        this.methodConfigurers = methodConfigurers;
054        this.methodHandlers = methodHandlers;
055    }
056
057    public static boolean isConcrete(Class<?> extensionType) {
058        return extensionType.getAnnotation(GenerateSqlObject.class) != null;
059    }
060
061    public static SqlObjectInitData initData() {
062        final SqlObjectInitData result = INIT_DATA.get();
063        if (result == null) {
064            throw new IllegalStateException("Implemented SqlObject types must be initialized by SqlObjectFactory");
065        }
066        return result;
067    }
068
069    public static Method lookupMethod(String methodName, Class<?>... parameterTypes) {
070        return lookupMethod(initData().extensionType, methodName, parameterTypes);
071    }
072
073    private static Method lookupMethod(Class<?> klass, String methodName, Class<?>... parameterTypes) {
074        try {
075            return klass.getMethod(methodName, parameterTypes);
076        } catch (NoSuchMethodException | SecurityException e) {
077            try {
078                return klass.getDeclaredMethod(methodName, parameterTypes);
079            } catch (Exception x) {
080                e.addSuppressed(x);
081                try {
082                    return SqlObject.class.getMethod(methodName, parameterTypes);
083                } catch (Exception x2) {
084                    e.addSuppressed(x2);
085                }
086            }
087            throw new IllegalStateException(
088                    String.format("can't find %s#%s%s", klass.getName(), methodName, Arrays.asList(parameterTypes)), e);
089        }
090    }
091
092    public boolean isConcrete() {
093        return concrete;
094    }
095
096    public Class<?> extensionType() {
097        return extensionType;
098    }
099
100    public <E> E instantiate(Class<E> passExtensionType, HandleSupplier handle, ConfigRegistry instanceConfig) {
101        if (!extensionType.equals(passExtensionType)) {
102            throw new IllegalArgumentException("mismatch extension type");
103        }
104        try {
105            return Invocations.invokeWith(SqlObjectInitData.INIT_DATA, this, () ->
106                passExtensionType.cast(
107                    Class.forName(extensionType.getPackage().getName() + "." + extensionType.getSimpleName() + "Impl")
108                        .getConstructor(HandleSupplier.class, ConfigRegistry.class)
109                        .newInstance(handle, instanceConfig)));
110        } catch (Exception | ExceptionInInitializerError e) {
111            throw new UnableToCreateSqlObjectException(e);
112        }
113    }
114
115    public ConfigRegistry configureInstance(ConfigRegistry config) {
116        return instanceConfigurer.apply(config);
117    }
118
119    public void forEachMethodHandler(BiConsumer<Method, Handler> action) {
120        methodHandlers.forEach(action);
121    }
122
123    public Supplier<InContextInvoker> lazyInvoker(Object target, Method method, HandleSupplier handle, ConfigRegistry instanceConfig) {
124        return MemoizingSupplier.of(() -> {
125            ExtensionMethod extensionMethod = new ExtensionMethod(extensionType, method);
126            ConfigRegistry methodConfig = methodConfigurers.get(method).apply(instanceConfig.createCopy());
127            Handler methodHandler = methodHandlers.get(method);
128            methodHandler.warm(methodConfig);
129            return new InContextInvoker() {
130                @Override
131                public Object invoke(Object[] args) {
132                    return call(() -> methodHandler.invoke(target, args == null ? NO_ARGS : args, handle));
133                }
134
135                @Override
136                public Object call(Callable<?> task) {
137                    try {
138                        return handle.invokeInContext(
139                                extensionMethod,
140                                methodConfig,
141                                task);
142                    } catch (Exception x) {
143                        throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(x);
144                    }
145                }
146            };
147        });
148    }
149
150    public interface InContextInvoker {
151        Object invoke(Object[] args);
152        Object call(Callable<?> task);
153        default Object call(Runnable task) { // NOPMD
154            return call(() -> {
155                task.run();
156                return null;
157            });
158        }
159    }
160}
